name: Debbie's Dramatic Diner
description:
Debbie's Dramatic Diner is a fast-paced capture-the-flag for two players. The Game can be played on the keyboard or (preferably if possible) with controllers.

The goal of the game is to be the first customer to come through with your entire order. Do this by holdning the menu card. Obstruct the other player by throwing shoes at them - But remember to pick up your shoes again!

Controls

For keyboard (player 1) - WASD and V (player2) UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT and P

Credits

Developed by Jonas Nørgaard, Malene Kristensen, Alexander Bülow and Gustav Corpas

Music by: 

https://opengameart.org/content/happy-arcade-tune

https://opengameart.org/content/arcade-title-8-bit-chiptune

https://opengameart.org/content/arcade-fast-flow-sound
